madgeAbcVersion.name: madgeAbcVersion
madgeAbcVersion.description: The version number of the Active Broadcast Control MIB. The most recent version is 1.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterState.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterState
madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterState.description: The current state of the ARE (All Route Explorer) filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: Only optimal ARE frames will be forwared onto other ports - optimal frames are those which are quicker or have shorter routing information than other frames. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFlushCache.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFlushCache
madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the ARE filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterCount.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterCount
madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterCount.description: The total number of ARE frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFiltered.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFiltered
madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterFiltered.description: The total number of ARE frames the filter has removed.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterTimeout.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterTimeout
madgeAbcTokenRingAreFilterTimeout.description: The maximum lifetime of an entry in the ARE filter cache. Default value : 100 (centiseconds) Minimum value : 25 Maximum value : 60000 (=10 minutes)

madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionState.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionState
madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionState.description: The current state of the ARE (All Route Explorer) conversion filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: Turn on ARE conversion. The frames specified by the mode key will be converted into Spanning Tree Explorers (ARE). monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFlushCache.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFlushCache
madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the ARE filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionCount.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionCount
madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionCount.description: The total number of ARE frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFiltered.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFiltered
madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionFiltered.description: The total number of ARE frames the filter has converted into STEs.

madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionMode.name: madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionMode
madgeAbcTokenRingAreConversionMode.description: This variable controls the action taken when forwarding All Routes Explorer frames. first: convert all ARE frames with a RIF length of 2 to STE frames. all: convert all ARE frames to STE frames. bcast-first: convert all ARE frames with the broadcast destination address, with a RIF length of 2 to STE frames. bcast-all: convert all ARE frames with the broadcast destination address to STE frames.

madgeAbcNetbiosNameState.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameState
madgeAbcNetbiosNameState.description: The current state of the NetBIOS name filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: Frames sent to recognised NetBIOS names will be forwarded on the port(s) on which the names are known to exist. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcNetbiosNameFlushCache.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameFlushCache
madgeAbcNetbiosNameFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the NetBIOS name filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcNetbiosNameCount.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameCount
madgeAbcNetbiosNameCount.description: The total number of NetBIOS frames seen by the filter that have a named destination.

madgeAbcNetbiosNameFiltered.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameFiltered
madgeAbcNetbiosNameFiltered.description: The total number of NetBIOS frames that the filter has been able to forward on the appropriate port(s).

madgeAbcNetbiosNameTimeout.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameTimeout
madgeAbcNetbiosNameTimeout.description: The time for which a name will remain in the NetBIOS name cache. Default value : 78000 (centiseconds) (=13 minutes) Minimum value : 100 Maximum value : 60480000 (=1 day)

madgeAbcNetbiosNameForwardTimeout.name: madgeAbcNetbiosNameForwardTimeout
madgeAbcNetbiosNameForwardTimeout.description: The time for which NAME_QUERY frames for a name will be forwarded without receiving a reply. If no reply is received within this time the entry will be removed from the cache Default value : 40 (centiseconds) (=.4 seconds) Minimum value : 10 Maximum value : 6000 (=1 minute)

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameState.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameState
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameState.description: The current state of the NetBIOS ADD_NAME_QUERY filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: The frequency of retries by NetBIOS stations will be limited to a certain number over a particular period of time. The number and time are configureable. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFlushCache.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFlushCache
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the ADD_NAME_QUERY filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameCount.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameCount
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameCount.description: The total number of ADD_NAME_QUERY NetBIOS frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFiltered.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFiltered
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameFiltered.description: The total number of ADD_NAME_QUERY NetBIOS frames that have been removed by the filter.

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryPeriod.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryPeriod
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryPeriod.description: The time over which a maximum number of ADD_NAME_QUERY frames will be forwarded. Default value : 500 (centiseconds) Minimum value : 100 Maximum value : 6000 (=1 minute)

madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryCount.name: madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryCount
madgeAbcNetbiosAddNameRetryCount.description: The maximum number of times a ADD_NAME_QUERY frame will be forwarded within a given period of time. Default value : 2 Minimum value : 1 Maximum value : 10

madgeAbcIpArpState.name: madgeAbcIpArpState
madgeAbcIpArpState.description: The current state of the ARP filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: ARP frames for recognised IP addresses will be forwarded only on the port(s) on which the IP address is known to be. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcIpArpFlushCache.name: madgeAbcIpArpFlushCache
madgeAbcIpArpFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the ARP filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcIpArpCount.name: madgeAbcIpArpCount
madgeAbcIpArpCount.description: The total number of ARP frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcIpArpFiltered.name: madgeAbcIpArpFiltered
madgeAbcIpArpFiltered.description: The total number of ARP frames that the filter has been able to forward on the appropriate port(s).

madgeAbcIpArpTimeout.name: madgeAbcIpArpTimeout
madgeAbcIpArpTimeout.description: The time for which an IP address will remain in the ARP cache. Default value : 60000 (centiseconds) (=10 minutes) Minimum value : 100 Maximum value : 60480000 (=1 day)

madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressState.name: madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressState
madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressState.description: The current state of the RIP/SAP suppression filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: IPX RIP and SAP Response frames will be forwarded only to those ports that have recently sourced such a frame. This reduces the number of gratuitous frames sent out on LANs that only have IPX workstations attached. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFlushCache.name: madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFlushCache
madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the IPX RIP/SAP suppression filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressCount.name: madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressCount
madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressCount.description: The total number of RIP and SAP frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFiltered.name: madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFiltered
madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressFiltered.description: The total number of frames the filter has has been able to filter.

madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressTimeout.name: madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressTimeout
madgeAbcIpxRipSapSuppressTimeout.description: The time for which a port will receive RIP and SAP response frames after sourcing such a frame. Default value : 60000 (centiseconds) (=10 minutes) Minimum value : 36000 (=6 minutes) Maximum value : 720000 (=2 hours)

madgeAbcIpxType20FilterState.name: madgeAbcIpxType20FilterState
madgeAbcIpxType20FilterState.description: The current state of the IPX Type 20 filter. disable: Perform no action. enable: Only optimal Type 20 frames will be forwared onto other ports - optimal frames are those which are quicker or have shorter routing information than other frames. monitor: No filtering will be performed but the potential performance of the filter will be measured, i.e. the count and timeout keys will be incremented as if the filter was on.

madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFlushCache.name: madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFlushCache
madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFlushCache.description: Write the value 1 (flush) to flush the Type 20 filter cache and reset counters.

madgeAbcIpxType20FilterCount.name: madgeAbcIpxType20FilterCount
madgeAbcIpxType20FilterCount.description: The total number of Type 20 frames seen by the filter.

madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFiltered.name: madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFiltered
madgeAbcIpxType20FilterFiltered.description: The total number of Type 20 frames the filter has removed.

madgeAbcIpxType20FilterTimeout.name: madgeAbcIpxType20FilterTimeout
madgeAbcIpxType20FilterTimeout.description: The maximum lifetime of an entry in the Type 20 filter cache. Default value : 100 (centiseconds) Minimum value : 25 Maximum value : 6000 (=1 minute)
